name: Plox Neon
description: Use your wits to find the best way to clear areas of the map and trap monsters to earn points in this byte-sized arcade experience with action-packed puzzles and music to match!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: 2.4 GHz CPU or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space
